Paragraphs.Text: The string data type is how character sequences are represented in C#. Use " to indicate the beginn and end of a string.
You can simply concat strings by using a plus (+). Be aware, that this operationcreates a new instance everytime.

If you have to do a lot of string concatination, consider using a StringBuilder. The StringBuilder allows you to continously append text, but does not create a new instance with every call. This migth not make a big difference in this example, but if you generate documents using the + operator can become a performance desaster.
